subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Records and Achievements
Running
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Roger Bannister tasted defeat in the Olympics before running the world’s first recorded sub-four-minute mile in 1954. Many in Britain regard him as the country’s most famous athlete of all time.
snippet: Roger Bannister tasted defeat in the Olympics before running the world’s first recorded sub-four-minute mile in 1954. Many in Britain regard him as the country’s most famous athlete of all time.
